item.description:
Join me for a nice Friday evening run on the bike path. My plan is to head out a bit past arlington center and back (5-6 miles or so depending on how far we decide to go!)

I am planning on running a moderate pace, nothing too crazy, perhaps 9's. I might be able to be convinced to go grab a beer at the burren afterwards :)

Hope to see some of you there!

Jen
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be by the davis sq T stop exit closest to Somerville Theater

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Friday Afternoon Jaunt on the Davis Sq bike path
